SCTX:
Begin PlagueHallRat1a


if ( GetJournalIndex "MS_CrimsonPlague" < 30 )
	if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
		Disable
	endif
elseif ( GetJournalIndex "MS_CrimsonPlague" == 30 )
	if ( GetDisabled == 1 )
		Enable
		StartCombat "Nerile Andaren"
	endif		
elseif ( GetJournalIndex "MS_CrimsonPlague" >= 60 )
	if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
		Disable
	endif
endif


if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	Set PlagueStage to ( PlagueStage + 1 )
endif



End PlagueHallRat1a
